DOC.brief_title: A Study BIND-014 Patients With Urothelial Carcinoma , Cholangiocarcinoma , Cervical Cancer Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head Neck

Prior treatment docetaxel within 6 month enrollment 3 . Stage II , III IV cardiac failure 4 . Carcinomatous meningitis 5 . Ongoing cardiac dysrhythmias 6 . Peripheral neuropathy 7 .
